summary: just a standalone version of PBS3 and VagabondAngel katana.
descriptionHtml:
as the title say its a stand alone of their replacer version of the katana.
you have 1h and 2h version in this file, they have no diference textures or meshes between them.

credits go to PBS3 and VagabondAngel for their work i only did it standalone nothing more.
you can find his original post and images of this katana at the link.

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4765

you can craft them and temper them, they are in the ebony tab.
or type in the console:  help \"Blacklight\" 4  that should give you the index for the swords.

21-01-12: changed name for BlackLight Blade to BlackLight Nodachi and added 2 ebony versions of it named Ebony BlackLight Nodachi and Ebony BlackLight Katana and probably fixed the 2h so it should be able to use the 2h perk.
i hope you like it if per chance you dont like the names im open to ideas thanks.


i hope you guys like it as i did.

have fun =)
author: PBS3
